```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)

png_files_fdr <- list.files('C:/Users/netio/Documents/UofW/Rockies/Hailey_Dotplots/fdr/', pattern='png')
dir.results.fdr <- "C:/Users/netio/Documents/UofW/Rockies/Hailey_Dotplots/fdr/"

png_files_pvalue <- list.files('C:/Users/netio/Documents/UofW/Rockies/Hailey_Dotplots/pvalue/', pattern='png')
dir.results.pvalue <- "C:/Users/netio/Documents/UofW/Rockies/Hailey_Dotplots/pvalue/"

```

### Immune Cells

